value.title: StarCraft 2: EPIC LURKER WARS! (Serral vs Reynor)
value.excerpt: Zerg versus Zerg is one of the most complicated matchups in StarCraft 2. If you miscontrol and mismicro in the first ten minutes of the game, it's pretty much game over right away. value.title: StarCraft 2: Extreme Late Game Terran vs Protoss!
value.excerpt: An exciting game of professional Terran versus Protoss between Fantasy and Trap. While generally speaking the late game of Zerg vs Protoss and Terran vs Zerg is quite a bit later, seeing Terran versus Protoss go past the 20 minute mark is unusual and creates some very exciting gameplay. value.title: StarCraft 2: KOREAN VS EUROPEAN ZERG VS ZERG! (Solar vs Serral)
value.excerpt: Zerg versus Zerg is one of the hardest matchups to play well in StarCraft 2. Since all units have very high damage output compared to their hitpoints, it can be over in a flash. In this professional match of SC2 I cast a game between Serral and Solar. Solar plays very aggressively and focuses on Muta

value.excerpt: Awesome game of pro StarCraft 2 between Stats and Namshar. Since both players pass each other on the map the game becomes a base race.
